pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 21, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Italy, His Excellency Paolo Gentiloni.

Office of the Prime Minister, Room 307-S
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold an expanded bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Italy.

Cabinet Room, Room 340-S
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of Italy.

House of Commons Foyer
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a luncheon on the occasion of the visit of the Prime Minister of Italy.

Sir John A. MacDonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
